Getting Started
===============

A step-by-step guide to setting up your first match in Update the Stream (UDTS).

Launching the app
-----------------
Find the folder where you put UDTS and launch `udts.exe`.

If you don't have UDTS installed, you can download the latest release from https://github.com/chhopsky/updatethestream/releases/ and unzip it.

Adding teams
------------

Creating matches

Recording scores
